Junkrat.name: Frag Launcher
Junkrat.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 128 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Junkrat.name: Concussion Mine
Junkrat.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.  Limit 1 active mine.

Junkrat.name: Steel Trap
Junkrat.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.  Limit 1 active trap.

Junkrat.name: RIP-Tire
Junkrat.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

Junkrat.name: Rocket Ride
Junkrat.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

Junkrat.name: Total Mayhem
Junkrat.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

1.name: Put Some English On It
1.description: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Bouncy Bouncy
1.description: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

4.name: Bonzer Hits
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine.  Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

4.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
4.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap.  Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

7.name: Tricky Shuffles
7.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Bogged Down
13.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

13.name: Chattering Teeth
13.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 45 seconds and increase its damage by 15%.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.name: BOOM POW
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.
